website_summaries.verdict: Reliable level 2 charging at 30 amps in a compact unit, but its available features are limited compared to others.
pros: Sleek, thin design that can be customized with separately available skins
Easy-to-read, on-unit charge indicator and timer delay
Provides 30 amps of power, reducing EV charge time significantly
cons: Electrician must install a dedicated 40-amp circuit to accommodate EVSE
No built-in Wi-Fi or companion app

customer_reviews.title: If you have an EV with at least 30 miles of range, you need this charger!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a champ! I've had this unit for almost a year now and it just works! The LED indicator on the front of the unit informs me with how long the unit has charged my EV for (each light indicating an hour). My car (a 2016 Chevy Volt) has time and location based charging, so it automatically starts charging during off-peak hours as I've programmed it to. My 2016 Chevy Volt charges from a fully depleted battery to fully charged (approximately15-16kwh) in about 4 hours. Much better than waiting 13-14 hours on a standard 120v outlet.
customer_reviews.author: BadAndy

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product - Easy to Install!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I was a bit worried at first about installing this myself but the installation was very easy. I purchased all of the parts I needed at Home Depot. Install took about 1.5 hours from start to finish. The cable is long enough to allow me to park in the driveway and charge the car even though I installed the unit in the garage. It is a quality piece of equipment. I like others had trouble figuring out how to order the sticker for the face of the unit but to be honest I am not sure I need one the unit looks clean without it.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Kraynak

customer_reviews.title: and it is fantastic. Cut charging time down from 7
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one for Ruby, my wife's new C-Max energy, and it is fantastic. Cut charging time down from 7.5 hours to just over 2 hours. Also allows me to use the C-Max's Go Time feature and have Ruby ready when we are without diminishing EV drive time. Unit looks good, electrician had no problem installing -- less than two hours and he had to run 35 feet of 8 gauge romex through the ceiling of my garage. Install ran $200, and got the charger for $488, so I am very happy. Looking fwd to getting the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Clark

customer_reviews.title: It works great with both
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our 2014 Chevy Volt and BMW i3. It works great with both! And has a long car plug cord (love that). It was super easy (for even the non-handy) to set up and install. BTW, even though Amazon noted that Schneider Electric was out of stock, I STILL got my EVSE super quick! Admittedly, I am an electrical NOOB however, I still rate myself as more competent than most. The technical genius I spoke with when I called their tech support gave outstanding customer service! I am sorry I didn't catch his name, he certainly deserves credit. FYI, use the wiring diagram on the sticker on the inside of the EVSE cover.
customer_reviews.author: Nursey

customer_reviews.title: Great charger, Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Free prime shipping with no tax! Has a few basic features such as delayed charging, etc, but my car has those features inherently. Overall, it does just what I need it to do...charge the car quickly. And, it is a Schneider Electric (SquareD) product so I feel confident in the quality. Installed the charger with AWG 8 wire on 30 amp circuit. I have a one car garage that we don't park in, so I installed the unit inside the garage and ran the cord through 5" of conduit and mounted just the cord and plug outside.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard Duquette

customer_reviews.title: works awesome. I already had a sub panel in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Use this for the Chevy Volt, charges in about 3-4 hours instead of 10-12 with the 110, works awesome. I already had a sub panel in the garage with a 100 amp feeder that I used very little of. Wiring this up was easy - maybe 10 minutes of work if you know what you are doing, and I replaced the drywall and installed 3⁄4" plywood panel on the drywall to mount this too for a more professional-looking, safety, and not-going-anywhere mounting & appearance.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent charger for EV cars
customer_reviews.text: After leasing a 2015 Nissan Leaf, I knew that I'd be looking at getting a charger installed. My co-worker told me about this, and the price was definitely better than what I'd seen from other competing models. I had it installed by a professional electrician, and it's already making us wonder how we fared without it. Plus, the free skin offer that comes along with it is pretty cool, if you care for that kind of thing. I would've coiled up the charger cable nicely for the photo, but honestly I just didn't care to...please don't judge me too harshly :-)
customer_reviews.author: S. Milton

customer_reviews.title: Buy this EV Charge station!
customer_reviews.text: Working great! Hardly any buzzing sound when charging(I guess that is an issue with other brands.) It is mounted on the garage wall in the other side of my bedroom wall. In fact, my ear points right to it In bed and I can't hear it. Install was not too hard. Just make sure you punch out the knockout before you mount on the wall! The free build your own custom skin is cool. It's been two weeks but I haven't gotten mine yet.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Tredinnick

customer_reviews.title: Simple, effective solution for my Nissan Leaf
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. Was looking for a faster solution for my Leaf, given the ~20 hours charge time. The unit is very well built, and once installed provides a simple and effective way without over complicating the process. The delay timer helps with nighttime charge rates. Other comments: not yet tried the photo option on the front, but will look into this later.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. R. Fitt

customer_reviews.title: This was a great solution for charging my LEAF
customer_reviews.text: This was a great solution for charging my LEAF. I did not have a 220v outlet in my charging location, and the total cost of buying this charger and installing it was less than buying a 220v charging cord and installing the necessary outlet. The EVCS is well-designed, sturdy, and has worked flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Thomas

customer_reviews.title: good for the price
customer_reviews.text: works well. occasionally has to be unplugged and then replugged in to get it to charge. cable length is awesome. the 'free skin' took FOREVER to get in, after numerous calls to customer service. it looks pretty good. the system is super easy to use- just wish I could find the user manual online.
customer_reviews.author: Terran Scout

customer_reviews.title: ... changed my experience as an EV owner for the better. It charges my Nissan Leaf quickly (2-3 hours) ...
customer_reviews.text: This charger has changed my experience as an EV owner for the better. It charges my Nissan Leaf quickly (2-3 hours) and keeps me on the road and saving gas. Installation was easy and I did it myself. The charge cord is nice and long. The design is very sleek and modern. Just as an FYI this is the same company that makes Square D products. I am sure the quality will be better than some of these pop up companies just making chargers. Also, I placed the order when the it said it was on back order and received it four days later.
customer_reviews.author: megan Becker

customer_reviews.title: Great EV Charger for Volt and Ford CMAX Energi
customer_reviews.text: This product was suggested by my Electrician. Install went flawlessly. It has been installed over a week now and working like a Charm. No need to pay those excessive prices that are suggested by many of the other Manufacturers, and this install is clean looking and professional. Would suggest to anyone considering a faster level 2 charger solution.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M

customer_reviews.title: Fast Charger
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to install. Be sure you put it on it's own dedicated 40 amp circuit. Mine did arrive with some loose wiring inside(easy fix) causing charge fault errors, but overall decent build quality for an indoor charger. You get one free customizable skin to order from their website. I'd recommend making your own, rather than the generic pictures on their site. This charger will take my Fusion Energi from empty to full in just under 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Ana R.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This charging unit has the good Yazaki plug and is very easy to set up an mount. I plumbed mine in using 1/2" plastic conduit, and even added a blue LCD Voltage/Amperage gauge to spiff it out. It is important to hook it to the highest voltage that your electric car can handle to get the fastest charging times. In my case, that was 240V. So even though I had 208V 3-phase closer, I routed wires from the 240V single-phase panel. Once the wires were routed, took all of half an hour to actually mount it and wire it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase
customer_reviews.text: It looks great. It's unimposing and blends right in with my garage. Does exactly what it's supposed to do. I have had it for years now and have NEVER had any sort of problem with it. It was well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Engler

customer_reviews.title: I love my new Nissan Leaf especially since we have the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Nissan Leaf especially since we have the Square D by Schneider Electric EV230WS EVlink 30-Amp Generation 2.5 Enhanced Model Indoor Electric Vehicle Charging Station. Now I ca charge my leaf in a fraction of the time it takes with the 120V charger. It's incredibly easy to use as well... just plug it in to the car...that's it. The car and the charger talk to each other and handle everything else. Now I can spend less time charging and more time driving!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Montanari

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in the garage and took the electrician approximately just ...
customer_reviews.text: We have two electric cars - the Accord Plug In Hybrid and the new Mercedes B-Class so we have been trying to charge two cars at home using trickle chargers for a month now and it has been very time consuming. We installed the new EV230WS and it charges the plug-in hybridin about an hour and allows us to charge the fully electric car overnight. Looks great in the garage and took the electrician approximately just 1 hour to install so was completely painless. Strongly recommend this solution for your EV needs.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Willetts

customer_reviews.title: Very good product with delay charging option
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this is it!!! Very good product with delay charging option, so you can take advantage of low cost energy in the night.
customer_reviews.author: Anirudh Badia

customer_reviews.title: Well for the price you couln't ask for a better 240 volt charger Easy to install 18 feet wire ...
customer_reviews.text: Well for the price you couln't ask for a better 240 volt charger Easy to install 18 feet wire is excellent size for a indor insallation, the handle wire is simply going under the garage door andis long enough to reach my Chevy Volt...
customer_reviews.author: Bel29

customer_reviews.title: and charging progress are a nice touch as well
customer_reviews.text: Installation was straight-forward, and the charger has been very reliable for the 7 months I've owned it. The simple indications for time-delayed charging, and charging progress are a nice touch as well.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: It works great. Takes about 2 hours to go from empty ...
customer_reviews.text: It works great. Takes about 2 hours to go from empty to full. Low noise, feel much more secure in the way I drive knowing it doesn't take 20 hours to charge up. Wasn't the cheapest, but I made the right decision. There are no online capabilities to gives me the stats of charging.
customer_reviews.author: Jermaine Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to our garage
customer_reviews.text: Received on a Saturday and installed by my regular electrician on Monday, this EVlink charging station works great! It charges my Ford C-Max Energi in a little over 2 hours. I also ordered the free custom skin without a glitch.
customer_reviews.author: NathalieM

customer_reviews.title: Good solid unit. Could use a Wifi controller.
customer_reviews.text: This device produces the power that it is rated to handle. It would be nice to have a wireless/app capability, so that it could be controlled by cellphone. In our installation it is connected to a 2013 Nissan Leaf, which has the capability of being controlled by on-line apps; but not all electric vehicles have that ability. Good quality. easy installation
customer_reviews.author: Terrance Berscheid

customer_reviews.title: Up for 2 months. Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Makes a bit of a loud clacking sound when it kicks on, but that's hardly anything to complain about. Although unnecessary, the limited interface does have a few options that may come in handy for someone. Easy to install. Easy to use. Much more reasonably priced. A+
customer_reviews.author: Brian Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Installed very easy. Great quality. My chevy volt charges fast on this level 2 charger.
customer_reviews.author: B. Locastro

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Really nice discreet charger. Took ~1.5 hours for our electrician to install. Works very well. Quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Charmaine A. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: The perfect charging accessory for your EV
customer_reviews.text: We own a Nissan LEAF and bought this to install when we ran the 240v line to our garage. It was installed easily by our electrician. Works perfectly. Speeds up the charging.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia S. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good charger,but thin and delicate.
customer_reviews.text: It recharges my Leaf in about 4 hrs. I made this unit portable ,mounted on the stainless plate. Unit has cheap and delicate cable holders easy to break, for that reason I clamp both power IN and OUT cables to the stainless plate for extra security and install NEMA 6-50 plug .This is very convenient way to carry the unit and plug at my work or any place with 50A 240V plug.
customer_reviews.author: tomaszzukowski

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Works as well as those at twice the price. Just bouight a Mercedes B-Class. The longest it's ever been plugged into this has been 3.5 hours to a full charge. Simple to use, lights are obvious to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Platt

customer_reviews.title: Solid.
customer_reviews.text: No issues or problems. As described. Happy with the product and price. Works fine on my 2015 Nissan Leaf.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Jorgensen

customer_reviews.title: Great L2 EVSE!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great EVSE. Its compact design fits perfectly in my garage and it looks stylish too! When my Volt's battery is completely dead, it charges it fully in less than 4 hours. We purchased this EVSE for our "2nd home" which we make frequent day trips to. Now that we have it, we can complete the entire round-trip without burning any gas!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Russell

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my sons 2013 Nissan Leaf. Full charge less than 4 hours. Works perfect. Very modern looking and takes up very little room.
customer_reviews.author: pismo1

customer_reviews.title: Best value and performs as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and provides the best value for anyone interested to buy a L2 EV home charger for EV. Easy to install and works great for my new Chevy Volt. I did lots of research on EV L2 charger and decided to purchase this product. My efforts proven well and this unit works like a champ per all description as advertised. Highly recommended for anyone shopping for a L2 EV charger amounts all options and brands.
customer_reviews.author: MSS

customer_reviews.title: Got it, installed it, and now charging.
customer_reviews.text: I just got the charger and had it installed. The front of the charger was a bit scuffed from shipping, but the free skin will cover that up. The unit is very light weight. You won't need much to anchor it to the wall. No issues with installation. My electrician wired it through the back side of the base for a clean install. I'm now ready for 240V charging. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Nissan Leaf must have accessory.
customer_reviews.text: Charges Our Nissan Leaf nicely. Super easy to install and use.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Works great; need electrician to install
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Needed an electrician to install it which didn't cost too much because I could put it near my fuse box is the garage. Needed permit from my township to install.
customer_reviews.author: John, San Francisco

customer_reviews.title: A Must for EV owners
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this charging station. It works great after a little problem with installation ( loose wire). Great tech support customer service. I'm charging my Leaf every night and waking up to a full charge. I'm able to take advantage of non peak hours! Just sorry I didn't get it sooner! This is a must for every EV owner!
customer_reviews.author: Jer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product !
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product ! Simple, straight forward with clear installation instructions. I wired mine directly to my load center with the recommended breaker. Started right up and charges my Nissan Leaf 4-5 times faster than the 110V trickle charger it came with
customer_reviews.author: DANIEL P MCGINN

customer_reviews.title: Compact size
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time. compact size does not occupy too much space.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Song

customer_reviews.title: Good quality charger for a bottom price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality charger for a bottom price. Could have spend twice the amount for getting the same result. Charges my new Nissan Leaf. Has a 18' cord that lets me do it in the garage and outside. Clear installation instructions.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect. Charges my car super fast
customer_reviews.text: Just got it in and installed. Works perfect. Charges my car super fast.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk A

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Shipped on time as promise. Damage to the box but the charger was not damaged Installing was quick and simple
customer_reviews.author: dym

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm with my i3. No problems whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: David M

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly and installs easy.
customer_reviews.text: I do mild electrical work. It installed easily. I used a 3 wire and a 40 amp 220 breaker. I also used a 1 inch wood bore for 2x4 garage studs ( no Sheetrock). It about 2 hours to install. The charger work perfectly for my Ford C-Max.
customer_reviews.author: BILLY STEPHENSON

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Ordered my Schneider EV230ws on Dec 1 2014, Had it installed Dec 14th without any problems,(Merry Xmas from the wife) works great & charges 3 times as fast. Can't beat the price & my electrician even recommended the EV230. Thanks Schneider.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: i gain more than 20% / hour on my Leaf. I am still trying out figure out how much exactly cause i over charge .. lol it is "too" fast ! Love it !
customer_reviews.author: carry86

customer_reviews.title: Love this charger
customer_reviews.text: Love this charger! It arrived on time, and scheduled an electrician to install. Since my breaker was in the garage, the install only costed @ $100. Now I can charge my Leaf in a fraction of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto E del Toro

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Well made and affordable 30amp level 2 charger. You have the option to use hard wire or plug type install because the wires just screw into a terminal block. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: T4Volt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Colleagues at work told me the charger was easy to install and provided a quick charge. I was excited to find that the product exceeded their references. The ability to personalize via the custom skin is also cool.
customer_reviews.author: Dan DesRuisseaux

customer_reviews.title: Fast charger
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, and charge much faster than the charger coming with the car (110 V).
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Purchased the Schneider charge control unit to reduce the charge ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Schneider charge control unit to reduce the charge time for the car from 10 hours to 4 hours. This is handy for recharging the car between morning and afternoon or afternoon and evening trips. At the time of purchase Schneider was offering a $200 gift card when this unit was purchased and reviewed on Amazon. The slower charge controlling unit that came with the car is slow, but is able to use a standard electrical outlet. This faster unit required an electrical installation of a 220V, three wire, 40 amp circuit.The wall unit has a clean design and is simple to use. The cord is an adequate length and both cord and plug have a quality feel.
customer_reviews.author: Chickenhead

customer_reviews.title: Great L2 Charger
customer_reviews.text: This charger works perfectly for my Volt. I have the unit installed inside my garage with the handle located on the outside of my garage (through the wall). I always park my vehicle outside and this setup protects the charger from the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Scott L Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Local professional electrician installed the Schneider Electric L2 battery charger ...
customer_reviews.text: Local professional electrician installed the Schneider Electric L2 battery charger in my garage. That shortened the charging time remarkably for my NISSAN LEAF.
customer_reviews.author: Toshio Hosaka

customer_reviews.title: Good product, works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived, I installed, and it works. Charges my Chevrolet Volt in <4 hours. Not much else to say.
customer_reviews.author: Gil

customer_reviews.title: Charge Me Up !
customer_reviews.text: The Schneider Electric charger works great with my Chevy Volt. The installation to my unattached garage took longer than I would have liked, but once installed my charging times have dropped ! I now have the ability to charge at home, recharge at work, and when I get home, using this charger, I can get enough juice back in the batteries to go out after work (without having the ICE start up). I never want to charge with 120v again :)
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: Square D by Schneider Electric EV charger
customer_reviews.text: I received my charger in good condition sooner than expected. It work great!. I work recommend this unit to EV owners.
customer_reviews.author: LOREN NIELSEN

customer_reviews.title: Easy EV Charger by Schneider Electric
customer_reviews.text: This box works like a charm. Easy to install, easy to connect. It feels solid and ... it charges an electric car. Bye, bye gas guzzlers.
customer_reviews.author: Dena

customer_reviews.title: Charging my volt no problem
customer_reviews.text: Have had this unit for about 1 month and it is charging my volt every day without issue. Was fairly easy to install can be used with both a hardwired or a pigtail (that is how I did it).
customer_reviews.author: Daniel W. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Just works.
customer_reviews.text: Unit was very easy to install, and does exactly what it is supposed to do. It quietly recharges my Leaf every night when I get home from work.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Potterton

customer_reviews.title: did not work
customer_reviews.text: it did not work but to Schneider credit they replaced not questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

product_meta.title: Schneider Electric EV230WS EVlink 30-Amp Generation 2.5 Enhanced Model Indoor Electric Vehicle Charging Station
product_meta.description:
View larger SCHNEIDER ELECTRIC EVLINK 30 AMP GENERATION 2.5 - INDOOR ELECTRIC VEHICLE CHARGING STATION
Charge faster with Schneider Electric's 30 Amp EVlink Indoor Charging Station that's simple to use, easy-to-install and is brought to you from the company that brings you Square D products — "the electrical contractor's brand of choice."

DESIGNED WITH YOU IN MIND
Schneider Electric's EVlink indoor charging station offers the perfect combination of user friendly features with a modern, customizable design. The charger's small footprint and mountable cable holder allow for maximum installation flexibility. In addition, you can personalize your charger by creating your own free custom skin.

SIMPLICITY AND EFFICIENCY
The EVlink indoor charging station includes a unique delay feature, helping you save money and minimize your impact on the grid. The intuitive LED display not only allows you to control your charging, but makes it easy to identify if the vehicle is charging, and how long it has charged.

CHANGING THE WORLD THROUGH SERVICE AND SUSTAINABILITY
In 2013, Schneider Electric launched the Charge the World, Change the World initiative to further the positive impact of customers buying EVlink indoor chargers. For every station sold, Schneider Electric will donate a solar powered, battery operated LED lamp to a family in need. Hundreds have been donated already, and with your help we can donate even more!


Schneider Electric has also been consistently recognized as one of the most sustainable companies in the world. In 2014, the Company was ranked in the Global Top 10 for sustainable enterprises according to Corporate Knights.

FEATURES & SPECIFICATIONS
 * Free custom skin — over 600 designs or create your own!
 * Sustainably focused — sleek minimalist design decreases waste
 * Powerful 30 Amp charging — flexible input voltage of 208 or 240 Volt AC
 * Flexible installation options — easily mountable with convenient cable holder to customize your installation
 * Charges up to four times faster than plugging into a standard (110 volt) home outlet
 * Auto restart feature ensures your car will continue to charge after a power outage or fault, automatic shut-off at 100 percent charge
 * Expanded customer support services and better troubleshooting to easily get answers to your question or quickly identify and fix faults
 * User-friendly, segmented LED display shows if the vehicle is charging and for how long it has charged
 * Stop button and indicator lights identify if the charger is ready to use or requires attention
 * 
 * Standards compliance — SAEJ1772, NEC625, UL 2594, UL 2231-1, UL 2231-2, UL 991, UL 1998, and UL 2251
 * Charging access: unrestricted
 * Society of automotive engineers (SAE) J1772 compatible and fully tested and interoperable with BMW Active E, Chevrolet Volt, Coda, Fisker Karma, Ford Focus, Nissan Leaf, Mitsubishi iMiEV, Toyota Plug-in Prius, Toyota RAV4, Honda FIT EV and more. 

EVlink Level 2 charging stations are quick to install home-based electric vehicle charging solution (view larger). Easy to install and integrate with other Schneider Electric products for a complete EV solution
feature_bullets: Make your EVlink charger uniquely yours with a custom skin, choose from over 600 designs or upload your favorite photo
Charges 2-4 times faster than plugging into a standard (110 volt) home outlet
Sleek, minimalist design works well in any home
Versatility works in a greater number of applications including locations wired for either 208 or 240 voltage

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars119 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
